column1: Table A-202:  Specific annual forest inventories by state used in development of forest C stock and stock change estimate
1 Plots in Alaska have not been split but are included in this column to conserve space in the Table.

Note: Remeasured annual plots represent a complete inventory cycle between measurements of the same plots while spilt annual cycle plots represent a single inventory cycle of plots that are split where remeasurements have yet to occur.
